title: Larsa Pippen is dressed to kill in sexy leather shorts and over-the-knee boots for dinner at Catch
text:
She filed for divorce from NBA alum Scottie Pippen almost a year ago.

Now Kourtney Kardashian's BFF Larsa Pippen is back on the scene with a vengeance.

She was spotted leaving celebrity haunt Catch Restaurant after dinner in West Hollywood on Thursday.

Leggy looker: Larsa Pippen donned leather shorts and over-the-knee boots when she was spotted leaving celebrity haunt Catch Restaurant after dinner in West Hollywood on Thursday

The beautiful blonde, 45, was dressed to thrill in teeny weeny leather shorts that she teamed with a low-cut black vest, sexy over-the-knee boots and a sparkly zebra print jacket.

Larsa's bodyguard towered over the petite 5ft 2ins celebrity as she made her way back to her car.

She looked equally sizzling when she stepped out for an evening at Hyde nightclub in West Hollywood on October 4.

Larsa again put on a leggy display in a black velvet onesie with the shorts cut high up to her derriere.

Petite star: The 45-year-old's bodyguard towered over the 5ft 2ins celebrity as she made her way back to her car

Animal print: Larsa donned a silver and black zebra-print jacket over her low-cup top

And if that wasn't enough to draw attention, the $200,000 bright red Lamborghini she rolled up in, certainly was.

Meanwhile, Kourtney said that it meant a lot to talk to Larsa about where they're both at in life in a recent edition of Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

The mom-of-three told cameras: 'Even if we're at different places in our lives, she'll still be one of my best friends.'

Certainly eye-catching: She looked equally sizzling when she arrived at Hyde nightclub in West Hollywood on October 4 in her $200,000 red Lamborghini

Larsa filed for divorce from husband of 21-years, Scottie Pippen, just under a year ago citing 'irreconcilable differences.'

The couple share four children - Scotty Jr., 18, Preston, 17Justin, 14, and Sophia, 11.

'It is with deep sadness that Scottie and I announce that we are legally separating.

'We both tried very hard for a long time to make our marriage work and have ultimately come to the conclusion that it is best that we live separate lives,' Larsa said in a statement at the time.
description: The 45-year-old made sure she was the center of attention in an eye-catching ensemble when she was spotted leaving celebrity haunt Catch Restaurant in West Hollywood on Thursday.
